scripts.build: cp -r *.html *.txt *.png *.xml css img js site.webmanifest dist/
scripts.serve-frontend: npm run cp-htm && npm run cp-react && browser-sync start --server --files
scripts.serve-frontend-dist: npm run build && npm run cp-2dist-htm && npm run cp-2dist-react && browser-sync start --server 'dist' --files 'dist'
